author: paulhauner
content: Should we expect ELs to serve `eth` endpoints via the JWT-authenticated RPC?

author: ajsutton
content: The engine API is supposed to include the `eth` namespace.  There's some talk of specifically listing the APIs but last I saw it still just said the whole namespace.

author: ajsutton
content: And the idea was to list whatever APIs were useful - the aim is to be explicit about what's available, not specifically to reduce the scope.

author: m.kalinin
content: Here we go with the list, https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/183

author: m.kalinin
content: All these methods must be exposed at auth endpoint as well

author: m.kalinin
content: Fully verified ancestor is influenced by optimistic blocks applied to the fork choice. It might be dangerous in some edge cases to attest to these blocks, even though they are fully verified
